sentences.en: CSHTM 10 - 15 mmHg Light Support Knee - High StockingsHelps energize tired legs and feet, improves circulation.
sentences.cn: CSHTM10-15mmHg轻型支架膝盖高StockingsHelps激励疲惫的腿和脚, 促进血液循环.

sentences.en: Energize is formed from energy by analogy with apologize from aplogy.
sentences.cn: Energize由energy演变构成,以此类推,apologize则 由apology演变构成.

sentences.en: Energize is formed from energy the same way that apologize is formed from apology.
sentences.cn: Energize由 energy演变构成,以此类推,apologize则由apology演变构成.

sentences.en: He helped energize and mobilize millions of people around the nation.
sentences.cn: 他帮助激励和动员了全国数百万人。

sentences.en: I am completely energized and feeling terrific.
sentences.cn: 我现在充满了活力，感觉棒极了。

sentences.en: It is one of the best ways to re - energize your brain.
sentences.cn: 这是让你的大脑重新充满能量的最好方式.

sentences.en: Motivation Forces that energize, direct, and sustain a person's efforts.
sentences.cn: 鼓舞 、 指引和维持个人努力行为的驱动力.

sentences.en: Nourishing multivitamins re - energize skin and gradually restoring skin bright colour.
sentences.cn: 丰富的维他命为皮肤补充足够的能量,使肌肤逐渐恢复亮丽白皙.

sentences.en: Protein foods energize, some experts say.
sentences.cn: 有些专家说蛋白质食品给人们提供能量.

sentences.en: These lasers usually employ chemical combustion to energize directly the lasing process by various one - way reactions.
sentences.cn: 这些激光器一般利用化学燃料,通过各种 单向 反应直接驱动激射过程.

sentences.en: This will energize the control, changing state of the load contacts.
sentences.cn: 这将激发控制装置, 改变符合端子的状态.

sentences.en: To worry is often to energize needlessly.
VISUALIZE , STRATEGIZE , ENERGIZE, REALIZE reprogramming is the subject today.
sentences.cn: 可想而知, 策划和推动我们,今天的主题是重新认识.

sentences.en: When I am weary, energize me.
sentences.cn: 当我厌倦时, 求祢激励.

sentences.en: Yes, I need to re - energize myself, too.
sentences.cn: 伯恩:好, 我也得加点油了.

words.tran_cn: 激发器，增能器；情绪兴奋剂
供给…能量；使精力充沛（等于energize）

trans.tran_en: to supply power or energy to a machine, an atom, etc.

trans.tran_cn: 加强，给与…以活力，使活跃，[物]给与…能量，给与…电压
